sqls.sql: SELECT mes_fb_trace_no, wka_no, wka_name, wkc_no, wkc_name, wkp_no, wkp_name, me_sn_part_id, me_material_sn_part_id, mes_fb_trace_rmk01, mes_fb_trace_rmk02, mes_fb_trace_rmk03, mes_fb_trace_rmk04, mes_fb_trace_rmk05, mes_fb_trace_rmk06, mes_fb_trace_rmk07, mes_fb_trace_rmk08, mes_fb_trace_rmk09, mes_fb_trace_rmk10, mes_fb_trace_rmk11, mes_fb_trace_rmk12, mes_fb_trace_rmk13, mes_fb_trace_rmk14, mes_fb_trace_rmk15, mes_fb_trace_rmk16, mes_fb_trace_rmk17, mes_fb_trace_rmk18, mes_fb_trace_rmk19, mes_fb_trace_rmk20, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM mes_fb_trace WHERE mes_fb_trace_id = @mes_fb_trace_id;
